# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

::: {.cable-meta}
:::


Request whatever U.S. export data on a by country by commodity basis USDOC computer can provide for Bolivia. Can print outs be sent US on a quarterly or semi-annual basis? Need here is great as Bolivian National Statistics Office has only now begun to process 1971 trade data.

***
